meanings.definition: To train (an animal) to lead or follow by using a halter.
meanings.sent1: She halterbreaks the horse to walk beside her.
meanings.sent2: The farmer halterbreaks the new calf to walk on a leash.
meanings.sent3: The dog trainer halterbreaks the puppy to walk without pulling.
meanings.sent4: With patience and treats, she halterbreaks the stubborn donkey.
meanings.sent5: He halterbreaks the young goat, teaching it to stay close.
